snippet: Three adults were killed and three others were severely injured when a tractor-trailer struck their S.U.V. on an icy highway, the police said.

byline.original: By ELI ROSENBERG and RICK ROJAS
byline.contributor: Eli Rosenberg reported from Hastings-on-Hudson, and Rick Rojas from New York. Susan C. Beachy contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Three adults were killed and three others were severely injured when a tractor-trailer struck their S.U.V. on an icy highway, the police said.

headline.main: A Hastings-on-Hudson Couple and a Friend Die in a Head-On Crash in Vermont

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Sports Utility Vehicles and Light Trucks
